name: Dogventure (kuzmaka)
description:
You wake up in the weird laboratory not feeling good about yourself. Find your way to get out and rescue your fellows.

Controls:

  • WASD or arrows to move
  • Q & E to use super power (when available)
  • F to toggle fullscreen mode

Known issues:

  • Safari browser is not supported
  • use English keyboard layout for controls

Credits:

Development and art:

  • Kuzma Kudim
  • Eugene Khromov

Art:
